dimension:
63 x 23 1/2 x 13 1/4in. (160 x 59.7 x 33.7cm)
10 in. (25.4 cm) (element, base of back)
title: St. Catherine
description: Life-sized statue of the saint with her foot on the head of the upper body of a bearded man, identified as the Roman Emperor Maxentius, who willed her torture and martyrdom.
creditline: Gift of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip, in memory of her mother, Julia Kellogg Morrison
